name: Rats Flow
description:
Story

You're a Englishman of  XVII age. Plague rages in London. You grabbed you rifle and went to the occultist to make it powerful enough to protect your house from flow of rats attacking city.

DEFEND YOUR HOME AND FAMILY FROM PLAGUE!

Some about project history

It's my very first project. It was made for MessyCoder Invasion Game Jam. My good friend helped me with artwork. Spent two hardworking weeks to complete this project.
